title: District 31
overview: After having grouped its investigators in its headquarters for many years, the Montreal police force decided to bring them closer to the population by reassigning them to neighborhood stations.Over the weeks, investigators will have to face the whole panoply of puzzles and crimes that can arise in a large city: kidnappings, burglaries, murders, family violence, sex crimes, settling of scores, drug trafficking, terrorist sympathies , economic crimes and others.We will also follow with great interest the fluctuations in their family or love life, which is bound to be felt as a result of their demanding profession.
